Title: For Blood or Money
Plot: When Rachel's brother-in-law makes a violent escape from a halfway house, Raylan is forced to hunt him down. Boyd entertains a dangerous offer in Harlan.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sexual references
